Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory752.jpg'}
{3: 'In the hush of midnight, a gentle mist rises among the mountain trees.'}
{3: "The fever medicine works quickly, and Yalin's temperature drops almost immediately."}
{3: 'At the moment, a gentle knocking sound comes from outside the door.'}
{3: 'Cautiously, Hanying stands up and opens the cabin door.'}
{3: 'A mechanoid gives a slight bow outside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Excuse me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you need any more assistance at the camp?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Hanying's hand already grips the cloak hanging by the doorway."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Two sheds are affected by the flood and need reconstruction materials and relocation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is everyone okay?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'We still need to inventory the items, but there are no casualties for now.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Breathing a sigh of relief, Hanying's grip loosens."}
{3: 'Boccioni takes a small package from his hand, clearly having tried his best to keep it dry on the way here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Is Yalin okay? I saw you two were very worried, holding her tightly just now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'There was some fever going on earlier.', 3: '27'}
{2: "But she's much better now.", 3: '28'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I feel like I'm at least partly responsible for what happened to her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'My negligence has caused harm to my hobby partner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "My coding system suggests that this doesn't count as a work mistake, but I still feel responsible.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Boccioni sets several boxes of medicine on the table, alongside paper-wrapped packets bearing Kowloong's distinctive markings."}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Let me take care of Yalin as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'To handle certain precise tasks, I developed a new pair of replacement hands. Before that, I also worked alongside medical mechanoids.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Boccioni showcases his arms, and the next moment, it looks like he's about to hand over a resume."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Some people have come here because of my invitation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Can you join me to check out the camp, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "We're counting on you here, Boccioni.", 3: '42'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: '【kuroname】! Hanying!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'From a higher vantage point, Dazhu waves to you, then turns to direct the mechanoids to haul away the unusable supplies.'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'Has Boccioni come looking for you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Man, I've never seen a mechanoid that beats itself up like this before. This is seriously blowing my mind.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is there anything else we can help with?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Hanying and you follow Dazhu's gaze toward the camp at this moment."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Wow, I almost thought I was short-circuiting in a dream.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You overhear a mechanoid muttering as you walk by.'}
{3: 'Two men are carrying a mechanoid out of a somewhat deformed wooden shelter.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, two mechanoids hurry over to help a child bundle up in a blanket.'}
{3: 'Some people are reinforcing the fence stakes again.'}
{3: 'While others have started a fire and are handing out hot water and food.'}
{3: 'On this post-storm night, a fresh sprout pierces the soil, digging its resilient roots into the earth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: "We've all got our own stuff to handle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'Let the rest of us jump in so we can actually do our part.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'By the way, if you walk from here to the dock, you might just catch the sunrise.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dazhu speaks loudly, then chuckles and pats your shoulder.'}
{3: "Before you realize it, it's nearly dawn."}
{3: 'The sky parts the clouds and mist, offering a fleeting moment of freedom.'}
{2: 'Shall we go watch the sunrise?', 3: '71'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hanying nods.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory567.jpg'}
{3: 'The two of you follow the fresh trail back to the dock where you first arrived.'}
{3: 'After being washed by the rain, the path carries the fresh scent of grass from the moist earth.'}
{3: 'These signs signal the changing of the seasons.'}
{3: 'You walk in silence as the sky gradually brightens to dawn.'}
{3: 'In the distance, you spot two silhouettes climbing onto the roof of the small signal station, carrying out emergency repairs.'}
{3: 'The lighthouse far away is no longer operational; perhaps soon it will light up again, serving as a beacon for travelers.'}
{3: 'At some point, Hanying slips her arm through yours.'}
{3: 'Just like that, you walk along the embankment, as early-morning seabirds wheel overhead in the pale dawn light.'}
{3: 'The morning wind feels bone-chilling, cutting right through you. Before you even realize it, this icy breeze pulls you closer to Hanying.'}
{3: 'It also keeps you completely sober.'}
{2: 'Unlike when I first got here,', 3: '88'}
{2: "it's beginning to feel like a real home.", 3: '89'}
{3: 'Hanying whispers the word, familiar as ever.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A place where someone is waiting for you to come back can be called "home."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She repeats her old internal dialogue, gazing up toward the horizon.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A single, modest storm can unite the entire community.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The "home" once built on mutual watchfulness and waiting now contrasts with the "home" that has been rebuilt and reborn.'}
{2: 'But ultimately, "victory" still found its way to us, didn\'t it?', 3: '98'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Maybe I'm just overthinking it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This place is bound to thrive, and our "family" will only continue to grow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But as it grows, its future becomes even more uncertain... Sometimes, the ones we call family end up feeling like strangers instead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Whether mechanoids or humans, the journey to find a home is fraught with difficulties.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'All I really wanted was to make everything... just a little simpler.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'How can I provide them with a true "home"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Actually, you have already done that.', 3: '108'}
{2: 'For many people...', 3: '109'}
{2: '"Home" is just the starting point of every journey.', 3: '110'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The starting point...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'It sounds a lot like what the Kowloong people call "seeking roots."', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's you who give them the opportunity to establish their roots.", 3: '114'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory723.jpg'}
{3: 'In these surrounding mountains and forests, before Hanying arrived, it was just an abandoned Kowloong complex.'}
{3: 'Yet centuries—perhaps even millennia—ago, people tilled the land, built homes, and raised families here.'}
{3: "They've also survived natural disasters, wars, and long separations."}
{3: 'Centuries later, their descendants return, restoring or rebuilding it, and wrestling with the same choices their ancestors once faced.'}
{3: 'They use this place as their new starting point.'}
{3: 'Sunlight pierces the horizon with an unstoppable brilliance.'}
{3: 'Without a starting point, there can be no journey to the end.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory567.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "Home isn't a destination, but the start of something new.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I don't need to lead the lost to a new home.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Instead, I should help them find their own "home."', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's why I said...", 3: '129'}
{2: 'You have already done it.', 3: '130'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory782.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'The first light of dawn finally breaks.'}
{3: 'It brings a touch of warmth, and yet you two draw closer together.'}
